short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access the Sourcescrub profile from a company's website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deal origination tool to streamline the *M&A professional's* workflow straight from a company's website. Perform real-time market research and due diligence by qualifying a company's firmographic data (such as location, headcount, and funding), relevant news updates, and historic/upcoming conference attendance
